reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's stunning pattern, comfortable fit that hits above the ankle, and its suitability for hot weather. Moreover, the dress is true to size, flatters various body types, and features a lovely blue lining. However, the fabric quality receives mixed reviews - while some find it strong, others say it's not great quality. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully made! Makes you feel great wearing the dress.
items.body: The dress is beautifully made. It is lined and the bottom panels move beautifully when you walk. Fit was a little snug in the top part of the dress, so I ordered a size up and it fits wonderful. Lots of compliments on the dress. Pattern is stunning in person. Very well made. Looks expensive. The weight of the dress comes from the bottom panels, but it is not too heavy. Comfortable to wear. There was no smell to dress. Read more
items.author: Jeanne B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Boutique quality!
items.body: Hoy heck. Buy this dress!! Every now and then I stumble upon something that I think warrants a cultish following and justifies IMMEDIATELY logging on to buy more of an item, before the quality tanks, as is so often the case. This dress looks EXACTLY as pictured. Even on me, and I am NOT built like that model. I am 5'3", 170lbs, and wear a 34DDD or 36DD. My measurements are : Bust 41, waist 37, hips 43. So I am curvy. I ordered a Large. It is PERFECT! This dress makes me feel so elegant and pulled together! Could be worn out to lunch, or to a summer wedding, and I know I'd get compliments. Amazingly, it has a BUILT IN LINER!! I haven't seen one of those since the early 2000's. And the fabric is thick, has a substantial, lovely drape, and is not see through in the least (thank you, built in liner!). Also, there is a hidden snap at the bodice's crossover, so that it stays put, and is modest but flattering. This dress looks like something you'd pay $180.00 or more for, in a boutique. I am logging on NOW, and getting the navy, and maybe the camel and white. I would never wash a dress like this in a washing machine. I'll spot clean and / or dry clean it. But that is true of the dresses i DID pay >$180.00 for, at boutiques. Read more
items.author: 3byrdsblu

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, and lovely dress.
items.body: It has pockets! The dress is pretty and comfortable. I did have to sew the front closed as the snap is tiny and allows the lower part of the bust to open. But once I tacked it down, it sits beautifully on my chest. Received many compliments. Nice and cool for a hot day. Read more
items.author: A Ford

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effortless Elegance with Everyday Comfort
items.body: I’m absolutely in love with this dress! The PRETTYGARDEN Boho Maxi Dress is the perfect blend of style, comfort, and practicality. The floral apricot black print is stunning—elegant without being overpowering—and the flowy A-line silhouette gives it a dreamy, romantic vibe that’s flattering on so many body types. The V-neckline adds a touch of sophistication, while the bell sleeves and tiered skirt bring that boho charm I was hoping for. It’s lightweight and breathable, making it ideal for warm summer days, yet the quality feels substantial enough to wear into early fall. And yes—it has pockets, which is always a win! I wore this to a garden party and received so many compliments. It transitions beautifully from casual daytime wear to a more dressed-up evening look with just a change of accessories. If you’re looking for a versatile maxi dress that feels as good as it looks, this one’s a must-have. Read more
items.author: Daisy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PRETTY DRESS
items.body: Okay, I love this dress!! The fit is perfect. I bought a large. The bust area fits smoothly , even includes a snap for modesty. I really love the band under the bust which creates a slenderizing waist line. The back has an elastic gathered band so it slips on with ease very comfortable, great length below the knee. I ended up buying three more of the same style. Very nice. The price was terrific. Colors are true to the pictures, the flowing skirt portion is so comfortable and pretty. The white dress has a slip layer so no worries about it being transparent. Read more
items.author: Darlene Winther

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Different pattern, but beautiful otherwise
items.body: Pattern was different than this when I got it and it completely changed the look of the dress, which I was bummed about because it’s beautiful in the picture. Was very comfortable and the perfect length for me. Went about to my calf and I’m 5’9” Read more
items.author: Aubrey Johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleased
items.body: Husband loves it. This dress is very pretty and it fits well. I find it true to size. I am 5'8, 165 lb. and ordered a large. I bought this to wear to a dinner for my husband's 50th high school reunion. I paired it with Little Plum sandals also from Amazon. Check them out as well! I feel like I can show up to this dinner feeling well dressed and confident. The material feels good against my skin and the dress is well made. The colors are striking. Read more
items.author: Melissa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Love this dress. Very nice quality and fit. I liked it so much I bout another one in a different color. Just wish it came in a petite length. Fit was perfect other than the length Took a bit to shorten it so that the pattern wasn't cut off Read more
items.author: amazon buyer feedback

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral Dark Green White, Floral White Blue, Floral Green White, Floral Light Apricot Orange, Floral White Black, Floral Wine Red White, Floral White Yellow, Floral Brick Red White, Floral Sky Blue White, Floral Khaki White, Floral Apricot Black, Floral Army Green White, Floral Black White, Floral White Rose Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
